name: Instant Pedicure
description:
Therapeutic Swiss Alps Lavender is blended with Capsicum to gently ease aches and pains. Tea Tree Oil – nature's wonder ingredient – is a natural, mild antiseptic and anti-fungal essential oil, to help keep feet healthy. Antioxidant rich Lemongrass acts as a natural anti-perspirant and protects against mild foot infections, and combined with Swiss Alps lavender has a calming effect. Nourishing and regenerating Evening Primrose Oil relaxes and calms. Dead Sea Salts contain ten times the mineral salt content of salt water and are packed with skin saving vitamins and minerals, some of which can only be found in the dead sea, to heal and soothe skin.

Application – rinse feet in warm water and pat dry. Mix the oils and the salts together and scoop a small amount into hands. A very gentle massage should be applied to the top of each foot, using mainly the essential oil blend, and a firmer massage using plenty of the salts should be applied to the underside, massaging for 60 seconds. Rinse in warm water and pat dry.

name: Instant Manicure
description:
Antioxidant-rich Grapeseed and Avocado Oils and Vitamins C and E, fight cell-damaging free radicals which potentially cause premature ageing. Walnut Oil, rich in essential fatty acids Omega 3 and 6, nourishes and hydrates skin while Orange Oil soothes, brightens and restores. Skin-soothing Rosemary Oil tones and combined with cooling and refreshing Peppermint Oil, invigorates the senses. Spearmint Oil emphasises the other active ingredients, maximising their effects. Dead Sea Salts contain ten times the mineral salt content of salt water and are packed with skin saving vitamins and minerals, some of which can only be found in the dead sea, to heal and soothe skin.

Application – rinse hands in warm water and pat dry. Mix the oils and salts together and scoop a small amount onto hands. Massage thoroughly into hands working treatment into cuticles and between fingers for 60 seconds. Rinse in warm water and pat dry.

name: Instant Body Bliss
description:
Tropical Passionflower Oil moisturises and calms skin while vitamin, mineral and protein rich Apricot Oil nourishes skin. Extracts of Guava and Melon help to strengthen and condition and antioxidant rich Grapeseed Oil helps fight cell damaging free radicals, to keep skin youthful. Antioxidant rich Lemongrass tones and revitalises skin and Neroli Oil boosts skin cell regeneration. Renowned natural aphrodisiac Sandalwood softens and nourishes skin and is even suitable for the most sensitive of skins. Vitamin A thickens the epidermis and improves skin elasticity while boosting the skin's natural production of collagen and powerful antioxidants Vitamins C and E fight cell damaging free radicals, which potentially cause premature ageing. Dead Sea Salts contain ten times the mineral salt content of salt water and are packed with skin saving vitamins and minerals, some of which can only be found in the dead sea, to heal and soothe skin.

Application – Mix the oils and salts together and gently massage into the body for 60 seconds, paying particular attention to cellulite prone areas. Rinse in warm water and pat dry.

name: 3 for 2 collagen capsules
description:
Buy 2 get 1 free Collage Capsules (1 bottles contains 90 capsules - one month supply)
 
The hero product in the Collection - proto-col pure collagen capsules - have been hailed by celebrities and beauty editors alike as the beauty holy grail in rejuvenating ageing skin. Proto-col's pure collagen capsules protect, nourish and firm skin and stimulate the skin's natural production of collagen to help plump fine lines and wrinkles, without the prolonged facial paralysis that is botox.
 
Collagen is the natural protein that is made up of amino acids - the natural building blocks of our skin. It is the most abundant structural protein in the body, making up 75% of the total protein of the body, and is found in skin, muscle, tendon and bone.
 
As your natural supply of collagen start to deplete from the age of around 25, taking a collagen supplement can help maintain a youthful complexion and optimum well-being. proto-col collagen capsules stimulate the skin's natural production of collagen and boost skin elasticity. When taken regulary, skin becomes noticeably firmer and fine lines and wrinkles and significantly reduced, and it is believed nail and hair follicles are strengthened by up to 36%. Proto-col is the only collagen supplement available that we are aware of which combines Type I and Type II collagen. This means proto-col collagen capsules benefit skin, hair and nails as well as aiding muscular and joint regeneration, collectively working to release essential amino acids and proteins that work to rebuild skin cells and stimulate the body's collagen production. Clinical studies have proven that taking pre, hydrolysed collagen can have a positive effect for sufferers of arthritis.

Ingredients -
Collagen Hydrolysate, Type I and Type II.
Other ingredients: Hard Gelatine Capsule.
Lactose free, gluten free, dairy free.
Not suitable for vegetarians and vegans. 
We do not recommend you take any supplements when pregnant.
 
Directions for use: Take three capsules every night, just before going to sleep, as it is during the first 90 minutes of sleep that your body's regeneration process is at its peak.
